Name: Night Lights
About the game: The world is different at night. Take on the role of a tiny robot and embark on an adventure to illuminate a darkened planet. Learn the tricks around the incredibly unique mechanic of manipulating light and shadow to change the surrounding environment, solve intricate puzzles, and ultimately collect shards to resurrect a fallen star. Features Manipulate light and shadow to explore and cut through the world Collect crystals to activate different tools & light sources 45 levels each with its own puzzles and unique solution Navigate complex platforms and find the portable light bulb for even more puzzle-solving gameplay /
